properties.verseOrder: c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Toa, toa sadaka yako, umtolee Bwana Mungu wako X2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
1. Ulicho nacho ewe mpe Bwana
Sadaka yako ewe mpe Bwana

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
2. Ukarimu wako ewe mpe Bwana
Uhai wako ewe mpe Bwana

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
3. Maisha yako ewe mpe Bwana
Shukrani yako ewe mpe Bwana

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
4. Ujana wako ewe- mpe Bwana
Usichana wako ewe mpe Bwana

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
5. Uzee wako ewe mpe Bwana
Uvulana wako ewe mpe Bwana

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
6. Matendo yako ewe mpe Bwana
Mateso yako ewe mpe Bwana
